name: B-Keeper
description:
B-Keeper is a short first person scavenger hunt about preserving threatened bee colonies.  "The forest surrounding your house is coming down in 3 days. You can’t stop it. But you can save the B’s."
  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Camera 
  • Left Shift: Run 
  • Left Mouse Button: Swing Net
  • E: Interact
